thread.title: TOWIE's Kate Wright denies having work done on face and says she's FED UP with men commenting on her looks
thread.title_full: TOWIE's Kate Wright denies having work done on face and says she's FED UP with men commenting on her looks

author: Lara Martin
title: TOWIE's Kate Wright denies having work done on face and says she's FED UP with men commenting on her looks
text:
TOWIE's Kate Wright denies having work done on face and says she's FED UP with men commenting on her looks The Essex star took to Snapchat to prove she's all real Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Kate Wright denies having plastic surgery Share this video Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
TOWIE ’s Kate Wright has launched a social media rant, saying she’s fed up with people making remarks about her appearance. 
The Essex reality star took to Snapchat overnight to deny all rumours she’s had any work done on her face, flaunting a make-up free visage to prove her point. 
Kate said: “You know what, I haven’t been on Snapchat for a while, but I’ve just got to say something. I’m fed up with people, especially men, commenting on how I look.” Kate denied any work on her face (Photo: Snapchat) The star said she was make-up free on Snapchat (Photo: Snapchat) Kate says she has eyelash extensions on but that's it (Photo: Snapchat) 
Pointing to her face, Kate added: “So here we are guys. I have no make up on. I’ve got a retainer in so my mouth looks funny. I can move my forehead, funny enough. Hmm…” 
She then said: “And for the people who will say I’ve got make-up on, I haven’t! I’ve got individual extensions on [my eyelashes], but, yeah, stop going in on my face. This is me!” 
Kate - who has admitted to some fillers in her lips - added in an interview with OK magazine that she would never edit her social media photos as she doesn't want people in real life to not recognise her. 
"I’ve got this thing that I don’t want people to see me in real life and think I look worse, I want people to see me in real life and think I look better," she said." 
"Especially when you're single, I wouldn’t want a guy to be like, 'Oh gosh, you look nothing like your Instagram'." Read More At Boot Camp in Ibiza with a friend (Photo: Twitter) Posing in a bikini during a break at Boot Camp (Photo: Instagram) Read More TOWIE's Kate Wright endures "tough week" at Boot Camp but says famous body is "nearly there" 
Kate has been overseas at the No 1 Boot Camp in Ibiza during the past week, working on her famous figure. 
She shared a photo to Instagram last week showing her looking slim and toned in her figure hugging sports wear, but told fans her dream body wasn’t quite there yet. 
“It’s been a tough but amazing week @no1_bootcamp so far ... but we r not giving up just yet ... #nearlythere #hardworkpaysoff," said Kate. 
But fans were quick to tell Kate they thought her figure was already amazing, and there was no "nearly there" about it! Kate's ex Dan Edgar in TOWIE (Photo: Simon Ford/REX Shutterstock (5239404o)) Kate split from Dan last year (Photo: FameFlynet) Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
